/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Buildings rise in the background, their architecture a testament to the city's blend of modernity and tradition. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of this bustling cityscape.
